name: Dmitri Loguinov
content: Dmitri Loguinov DEPARTMENT OF COMPUTER SCIENCE AND ENGINEERING | DWIGHT LOOK COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING | TEXAS A&M UNIVERSITY HOME ABOUT COURSES PEOPLE PROJECTS PUBLICATIONS CONTACT Dmitri Loguinov Professor Department of Computer Science and Engineering Texas A&M University College Station, TX 77843 dmitri@cs.tamu.edu, 979-845-0512 Education 10/2002 Ph.D. City University of New York (Computer Science) 6/1995 B.S. (with honors) Moscow State University (Computer Science) Research Interests Stochastic analysis of networks, graph algorithms, big-data computing, Internet measurement, peer-to-peer networks, congestion control, web crawling, topology modeling, and related topics Resume PDF PhD Thesis "Adaptive Scalable Internet Streaming" (PDF 286pp, single-spaced 187pp) Journal Publications Y.
